attributes.action: press criminal charges against all MP's who have made false expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of the UK are disgusted that this is not classed as a criminal offence, when it comes to MP's abusing a priviledged system that benfits them and fraudulently taking tax payers money from the system. We are a growing number of UK citizens who will fight this every step of the way and won't excpet that MP's are above the law.

rejection.details: Government does not 'press criminal charges' - This is a matter for the police/CPS
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
